channel.description: Sync users between tenants using Org2Org Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: Secure API connections between orgs with OAuth 2.0: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/secure-oauth-between-orgs/main/ Page type: Task Content type: How-to without code
